trans-unit.source: Used to specify the type of event, and its arguments (if any) to be generated as part of the rendering of text to speech by a custom synthetic speech engine.
trans-unit.target: 개의 문자 음성 변환의 렌더링의 일환으로 사용자 지정 합성 음성 엔진에서 생성할 이벤트의 유형 및 인수 (있는 경우)를 지정 하는 데 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A custom speech synthesis engine requests the generation of events under the Speech Platform by providing an appropriate SpeechEventInfo instance to <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A> member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> engine site object passed to implementations of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 적절 한 SpeechEventInfo 인스턴스를 제공 하 여 음성 플랫폼에는 이벤트의 생성을 요청 하는 사용자 지정 음성 합성 엔진이 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A>의 멤버는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>엔진 사이트 개체의 구현에 전달 된 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.RemoveLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.AddLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Constucts an appropriate <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 구성 가능한 적절 한 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Permitted values used for `parameterType`, `param1`, and `param2` and their meaning is dictated by the type of event being requested, as specified by the member of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId> used for `eventId`.
trans-unit.target: 에 사용 되는 값을 허용 `parameterType`, `param1`, 및 `param2` 요청 되는 이벤트의 형식에 해당 의미는 및의 구성원에 의해 지정 된 대로 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>에 사용 되는 `eventId`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on appropriate values for `parameterType`, `param1`, and `param2`, see documentation for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> The type of the events which can be handled by the Speech platform infrastructure can be obtained through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the synthesizer engine site implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>.
trans-unit.target: 적절 한 값에 대 한 자세한 내용은 `parameterType`, `param1`, 및 `param2`, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>음성 플랫폼 인프라에서 처리 될 수 있는 이벤트의 형식을 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>안내 하십시오.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> 신시사이저 엔진 사이트 구현에서 속성</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> 을 통해 가져올 수</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> 에 대 한 설명서를 참조 하세요.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId"></xref> indicating the sort of Speech platform event the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object is to handle.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId"> </xref> 음성 플랫폼 이벤트의 종류를 나타내는 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> 개체 처리 하기 위한 것입니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType"></xref> indicating how the <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr" name="System.IntPtr" href=""></xref> reference of `param2` is to be interpreted, and, by implication, the use of `param1`.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType"> </xref> 나타내는 방법을 <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr" name="System.IntPtr" href=""> </xref> 의 참조 `param2` 해석 해야 하는 고 암시, 사용 `param1`합니다.

trans-unit.source: An integer value to be passed to the Speech platform when the event requested by the instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> to be constructed is generated.
trans-unit.target: 음성 플랫폼의 인스턴스에서 이벤트 요청 될 때 전달 되는 정수 값 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> 생성을 생성할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The exact meaning of this integer is implicitly determined by the value of `parameterType`.
trans-unit.target: 이 정수의 정확한 의미는 암시적으로 값에 의해 결정 됩니다. `parameterType`합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr" name="System.IntPtr" href=""></xref> instance referencing an object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr" name="System.IntPtr" href=""> </xref> 인스턴스 개체 참조입니다.

trans-unit.source: to be passed to the Speech platform when the event requested by the instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> to be constructed is generated.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트의 인스턴스에서 요청 될 때 음성 플랫폼에 전달할 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> 생성을 생성할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The type which must be referenced is explicitly defined by the value `parameterType`.
trans-unit.target: 참조 해야 하는 형식 값에 명시적으로 정의한 `parameterType`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr.Zero" name="System.IntPtr.Zero" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 값 <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr.Zero" name="System.IntPtr.Zero" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a specified object is an instance of `SpeechEventInfo` and equal to the current instance of `SpeechEventInfo`.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 개체의 인스턴스가 있는지 여부를 결정 `SpeechEventInfo` 의 현재 인스턴스와 같은지 `SpeechEventInfo`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The object to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 평가할 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: if obj is equal to the current object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 경우 obj 현재 같은지 개체; 그렇지 않으면 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a specified `SpeechEventInfo` object is equal to the current instance of `SpeechEventInfo`.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 있는지 여부를 결정 `SpeechEventInfo` 개체의 현재 인스턴스와 같은지 `SpeechEventInfo`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> 평가할 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: if other is equal to the current object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 경우 other 현재 같은지 개체; 그렇지 않으면 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets and set the Speech platform event which an instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> is used to request.
trans-unit.target: 가져오고 음성 플랫폼 이벤트를 설정 있는 인스턴스의 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> 사용 요청에 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a member of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId"></xref> as a <xref uid="langword_csharp_short" name="short" href=""></xref>, indicating the event type the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object is to generate.
trans-unit.target: 멤버를 반환 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId"> </xref> 로 <xref uid="langword_csharp_short" name="short" href=""> </xref>, 이벤트 유형을 나타내는 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> 개체 생성 하는 것입니다.

trans-unit.source: Provides a hash code for a `SpeechEventInfo` object.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 해시 코드를 제공는 `SpeechEventInfo` 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for a <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 해시 코드는 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two instances of `SpeechEventInfo` are equal.
trans-unit.target: 두 인스턴스가 있는지 여부를 결정의 `SpeechEventInfo` 같은지 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object to compare to `event2`.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> 비교할 개체 `event2`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object to compare to `event1`.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> 비교할 개체 `event1`합니다.

trans-unit.source: if event1 is the same as event2; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if event1 is the same as event2; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two instances of `SpeechEventInfo` are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 두 인스턴스가 있는지 여부를 결정의 `SpeechEventInfo` 같지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object to compare to `event2`.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> 비교할 개체 `event2`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object to compare to `event1`.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> 비교할 개체 `event1`합니다.

trans-unit.source: if event1 is different from event2; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if event1 is different from event2; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Gets and set the value (param1 in the constructor) to be passed to the Speech platform to generate an event the current instance of is used to request.
trans-unit.target: 가져오기 및 설정은 값 ( param1 생성자에서)의 현재 인스턴스에 이벤트를 생성 하는 음성 플랫폼 변수에 전달 될 사용 요청에 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The requirements and meaning of Param1 property of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> are uniquely determined by the values of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A> properties the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: 요구 사항 및 Param1 속성의 의미 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>고유 하 게의 값에 따라 결정 되는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>및 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A>속성은 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>인스턴스.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on how use Param1, see documentation for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 Param1를 사용 하 여, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> 에 대 한 설명서를 참조 하세요.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> to be passed to Speech platform when the event specified by the current instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> is generated.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> 이벤트의 현재 인스턴스에 의해 지정 된 경우 음성 플랫폼에 전달할 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> 생성 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets and set the instance (param2 in the constructor) referencing the object to be passed to the Speech platform to generate an event the current instance of is used to request.
trans-unit.target: 가져오기 및 설정은 인스턴스 ( param2 생성자에서)의 현재 인스턴스에 이벤트를 생성 하는 음성 플랫폼 변수에 전달 될 개체를 참조 사용 요청에 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The requirements on the `System.IntPtr` reference of the Param2 property of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> are uniquely determined by the values of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A> properties the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: 요구 사항을 `System.IntPtr` 의 매개 변수&2;가 속성 참조 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>고유 하 게의 값에 따라 결정 되는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>및 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A>속성은 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>인스턴스.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on how use Param2, see documentation for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 방법에 대 한 자세한 정보에 대 한 매개 변수&2;가 사용 하 여, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> 에 대 한 설명서를 참조 하세요.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr" name="System.IntPtr" href=""></xref> referencing the object to be passed to Speech platform when the event specified by the current instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> is generated.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IntPtr" name="System.IntPtr" href=""> </xref> 이벤트의 현재 인스턴스에 의해 지정 된 경우 음성 플랫폼에 전달할 개체 참조 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> 생성 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the data type of the object pointed to by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""></xref> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2*> parameter on the current <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 가 가리키는 개체의 데이터 형식을 반환는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""> </xref> 에서 반환 되는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2*>매개 변수는 현재 상태에서 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> 개체입니다.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2*>

trans-unit.source: The requirements on the `System.IntPtr` reference of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A> property of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> are uniquely determined by the values of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> and ParameterType properties the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: 요구 사항을 `System.IntPtr` 의 참조는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A>속성 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>고유 하 게의 값에 따라 결정 됩니다는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>및 ParameterType 속성은 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>인스턴스.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A>

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on how use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A>, see documentation for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> 에 대 한 설명서를 참조 하십시오</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_short" name="short" href=""></xref> value corresponding to a member of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType"></xref> enumeration and indicating the data type of the object pointed to by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""></xref> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2*> parameter and used as the second argument for the constructor of the current <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_short" name="short" href=""> </xref> 의 멤버에 해당 값는 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType"> </xref> 에서 가리키는 열거와 개체의 데이터 형식을 나타내는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_IntPtr" name="IntPtr" href=""> </xref> 에서 반환 되는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2*>매개 변수 현재 생성자에 대 한 두 번째 인수로 사용 하 고 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo"> </xref> 개체입니다.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.Param2*>
